::Slayer::

Slayer smiles, watching Bullet leave. He admired the way Prebon 
handled his troops. Slayer looks back at Probon and nods, then sits 
down.

"I was retreating, Master," he explains, "When the wolf attacked me. 
We fought the battle to a duel, but I lost too much fuel, and 
obvioustly went into stasis on my way back to base."




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Bullet snorted at Slayer "It was Prebons orders to have you 
stay..." The
> bull was interupted by a stern voice from behind him.
> 
> "My orders were to stay put and rest Slayer, and Bullet? Who told 
you to
> relay my orders? I can give them myself." Prebon stood straight 
upright, a
> symbol of leadership if ever there was one. The cold stare he was 
giving
> Bullet made the subordinate slump in respect.
> 
> "I was just..." Bullet managed to studder
> Prebon didn't let him finish"You were just reconsidering trying to 
justify
> yourself!" His eyes flared demanding the other bot to stand down.
> Bullet straightened up again, looked Prebon straight in the eye and
> responded with two words, "YES SIR."
> Prebons eyes narrowed as he took another look at Bullet. "You are 
dismissed"
> he said, smiling after lessoning another bot in front of Slayer. 
Bullet
> didn't say another word. He turned and departed leaving Slayer and 
Prebon
> alone.
> 
> Prebon took his gaze off the departing bull and turned his 
attention to
> Slayer. "Sit down Slayer, we have much to discuss. Lets start with 
an
> explanation on why you didn't follow my order to retreat, and what 
happened
> to you since." He leaned back against the wall and awaited an 
explanation.
